00050 class cwwwstatmod : public cmod {
00051         protected:
00052                 auto_ptr<cinfodb> idb;
00053                 static const char _id[];
00054                 static const char _conf[];
00055                 static const char _name[];
00056                 static const char _menu[];
00057                 
00058                 std::string domains, domain;
00059                 bool empty; 
00060

00064                 void act_user();

00066                 void item_dump( const std::string & );
00067         public:

00070                 const char *name() { return _name; }
00071                 const char *menu() { return _menu; }
00072                 const char *conf() { return _conf; }
00073                 char run();
